publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4565 Brian Adam: Dyce Academy ROV Successâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Dyce Academy in winning the MATE Scotland ROV Challenge, which qualified it for the MATE International ROV competition at the Massachusetts Maritime Academy where it competed alongside schools from across the world in designing the next generation of submarine rescue systems; notes that The Robert Gordon University also took part in this competition where both teams performed admirably, and thanks the sponsors, hosts and staff for giving up their time and money to make these events a success.
S3M-4565 Dyce Academy ROV Success (lodged on 3 July 2009) Maureen Watt*
S3M-4565 Dyce Academy ROV Success (lodged on 3 July 2009) Kenneth Gibson*, Richard Baker*
